languages.text: "Эти калеки не опасны. Не к чему стрелять и привлекать внимание".
"The blinded ones are harmless. No sense in shooting them and drawing attention."
languages.original_text: "Эти калеки не опасны. Не к чему стрелять и привлекать внимание".

traits.locale_text: "The blinded ones are harmless. No sense in shooting them and drawing attention."
"The blinded ones are harmless. No sense in shooting them and drawing attention."
"The blinded ones are harmless. No sense in shooting them and drawing attention."
"The blinded ones are harmless. No sense in shooting them and drawing attention."

languages.text: “那些瞎子不会攻击别人。没必要朝他们开火，引起敌人注意。”
languages.original_text: "The blinded ones are harmless. No sense in shooting them and drawing attention."

traits.locale_text: “那些瞎子不会攻击别人。没必要朝他们开火，引起敌人注意。”

languages.text: 「目の見えぬ者は無害だ。奴らを撃って目を引くのは無意味だ」
languages.original_text: "The blinded ones are harmless. No sense in shooting them and drawing attention."

traits.locale_text: 「目の見えぬ者は無害だ。奴らを撃って目を引くのは無意味だ」

languages.text: "Die Blinden sind harmlos. Es ist sinnlos, sie zu beschießen und Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen."
languages.original_text: "The blinded ones are harmless. No sense in shooting them and drawing attention."

traits.locale_text: "Die Blinden sind harmlos. Es ist sinnlos, sie zu beschießen und Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen."

languages.text: « Les aveugles sont inoffensifs. Inutile de leur tirer dessus, ça attirerait l'attention. »
languages.original_text: "The blinded ones are harmless. No sense in shooting them and drawing attention."

traits.locale_text: « Les aveugles sont inoffensifs. Inutile de leur tirer dessus, ça attirerait l'attention. »

languages.text: «Los ciegos son inofensivos. No merece la pena dispararles y llamar la atención».
languages.original_text: "The blinded ones are harmless. No sense in shooting them and drawing attention."

traits.locale_text: «Los ciegos son inofensivos. No merece la pena dispararles y llamar la atención».

languages.text: "Körler zararsız. Onları vurup dikkat çekmenin manası yok."
languages.original_text: "The blinded ones are harmless. No sense in shooting them and drawing attention."

traits.locale_text: "Kör olanlar zararsızdır. Onlara ateş etmenin ve dikkat çekmenin manası yok."
